channel.title: Directors on HoneyTrap
channel.description: Recent content in Directors on HoneyTrap

item.title: Forward
item.description: // TODO This documentation is still work in progress. Description The forward director will forward traffic to a remote host. Syntax [director.forward] type="forward" Arguments in config file There is 1 argument in forward director: argument default setting explanation host none Set the ip address of the remote host. Example If you want to override the destination port, you can specify a port where all forwarded traffic will be directed to.

item.title: LXC Container
item.description: // TODO This documentation is still work in progress. Description The lxc director will spawn a container per attacker. After a period of inactivity, the container will be frozen and eventually stopped. When the attacker returns, the original container will be assigned to his session. Syntax [director.lxc] type="lxc" Arguments in config file There are 3 arguments in lxc director: argument default setting explanation freeze_every 15 min The duration of inactivity after which a containter will be frozen.
